import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Slide from 'react-reveal/Slide'; class CountDown extends Component { state = { deadline:'May,27,2019', days:'0', hours:'0', minutes:'0', seconds:'0' } getTimeUntil(deadline){ const time= Date.parse(deadline) - Date.parse(new Date()); console.log(time); } componentDidMount() { setInterval( ()=> this.getTimeUntil(this.state.deadline),1000 ) } render() { return (

); } } export default CountDown;
